citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The most recent semiannual facility inspection and program review occurred over 8 months ago on 26 APR 2022. The
IACUC must conduct these activities at least once every six months to help ensure the appropriate care and use of
animals at the research facility.
Correct by: February 10, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
2.31(c) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The most recent semiannual facility inspection and program review occurred over 8 months ago on 26 APR 2022.  The 
IACUC must conduct these activities at least once every six months to help ensure the appropriate care and use of 
animals at the research facility. 
 
Correct by:  February 10, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
End Section
